game.title: The quest
game.description: Find the treasure in the dungeon

task.objective: Find the treasure in the dungeon
task.description: Search for the hidden treasure in the deep and dark dungeon.
Slay the fearsome Ogre Guardian that blocks your way to the treasure chamber.
Retrieve the ancient map that shows the location of the treasure chamber.

task.objective: Solve the riddle of the three gates
task.description: Solve the ancient riddle to open the door to the treasure chamber.

task.objective: Escape the traps and puzzles in the Treasure Chamber
task.description: Navigate through the deadly traps and ingenious puzzles to reach the treasure.
